mapper.insert:
select seq_temp.nextval from dual
insert into t86_1_host_preview (email, host_no, reg_date, start_date, end_date, img_path, img_oriname, img_realname, house_desc, house_cost) values (#{email}, #{hostNo}, #{regDate}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{imgPath}, #{imgOriName}, #{imgRealName}, #{houseDesc}, #{houseCost})
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, A.email, A.hostNo, A.regDate, A.startDate, A.endDate, A.imgPath, A.imgOriname, A.imgRealname, A.houseDesc, A.houseCost FROM (SELECT email, host_no AS hostNo, reg_date AS regDate, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, img_path AS imgPath, img_oriname AS imgOriname, img_realname AS imgRealname, house_desc AS houseDesc, house_cost AS houseCost FROM t86_1_host_preview ORDER BY reg_date DESC)A WHERE 3 >= ROWNUM
select * from t86_1_host_preview order by host_no desc
mapper.update: update t86_1_host_preview set reg_date = #{regDate}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, img_path = #{imgPath}, img_oriname = #{imgOriName}, img_realname = #{imgRealName}, house_desc = #{houseDesc}, house_cost = #{houseCost} where host_no = #{hostNo}
mapper.select: select de.host_no as hostNo, pre.reg_date as regDate, pre.img_path as imgPath, pre.img_realname as imgRealName, pre.house_desc as houseDesc, pre.house_cost as houseCost, loca.addr, loca.x_point as xPoint, loca.y_point as yPoint from T86_1_HOST_DETAIL de, T86_1_HOST_PREVIEW pre, T86_1_HOST_LOCATION loca, T86_1_HOSTING_STATUS stat where de.host_no = pre.host_no and pre.host_no = loca.host_no and loca.host_no = stat.host_no and de.house_capacity >= #{findCapacity} and stat.host_email != #{myEmail} and loca.addr like '%' || #{destAddr} || '%' and pre.start_date >= to_date(#{departDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(#{destDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= pre.end_date and stat.hosting_status = 'W'
